name: JourniMind
description:
JourniMind takes you on multiple journeys through the minds of our heroes whose real bodies have fallen into coma due to overworking.

How do we constantly remind ourselves to take the breaks we deserve? When work piles up and society demands so much from you, before you know it, you have hit that threshold.

What do you do when you finally take a break then? Most would indulge in watching movies or listening to music, for some, gaming is a temporarily and much needed escape. That's when Justin, producer of JourniMind thought that having a game that is engaging and stress-free while subtly reminding people the importance of taking breaks might just be the solution.

To be released on to Play Store soon.
